column3: bɔgya kurow! Ɔwo a nsɛmfun na epoobɔsɛm ahyɛ wo ma; na ewudzi so mmpa wo mu da."
na ntseaseanam anan ne kyirdidi; mpɔnkɔ hɔn kwam kwam tutu
column4: na ntseaseanam hɔn ehuruhuruw da no edzi dɛ;"
na peaa reyerɛyerɛw; na atɔfo pii
column5: na efun kuw kɛsenara a efun no wonnhu ewiei; na wofintsifintsiw hɔn efun no do mpo."

column6: ɔno a ɔdze ndwamansɛm tɔn amanaman

column2: "Na mobɔtow fi tantanntan egu wo do
column4: na medze wo esi hɔ dɛ ahwɛdze."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ hɔn a wɔhwɛ wo nyina befi wo nkyɛn eguan
column4: Ninive ayɛ ekurofo: woana na obosu ama no? Henfa na mobɔhwehwɛ ɔwerɛkyekyefo ama wo?"

column2: "Aso ɔwo iye sen No-amon a osi esutsen ntamu a esu etwa no ho ehyia no; na po yɛ ne ban na n’afasu no?"

column3: a nna hɔn tum nnyi mbanano; na Put na Lubim so nye n’aboafo."
wɔfaa no kɔr ndɔmmum: hɔn mbɔtowaba so wɔdze hɔn abobɔ abrɔn nyina do ekuku hɔn: na wɔtwee n’enyimnyamfo ho tonto
column4: na ne nyimpa etsitsir nyina woguguu mpokyerɛ mu."
na ɔwo so bɔhwehwɛ guansumabew wɔ ɔtamfo no ntsi."

column2: "W’abankɛse nyinara bɛyɛ dɛ adɔmbandua no do wɔ adɔmbakan beree: sɛ wɔwosow a

column3: wo akofo ayɛ mbaa wɔ wo mu; woebuebue w’asaase no mbobokɛse no pataa ama w’atamfo: na gya ahyew w’abokɛse ekyir adaban."
miamia w’abankɛse no mu: tsia dɛtse
column5: ma ntayaa fononoo no nyɛ dzen."

column2: "Hɔ na gya bɛmen wo; afona botwa wo akyen
column3: ɔbɛmen wo dɛ mbrɛ nkonyinko memen dza wohu biara: na kaansa ema wo dodow yɛ pii dɛ nkonyinko

column2: "Ama w’eguadzifo adɔɔ so asen ɔsor nworaba; naaso tse dɛ nkonyinko no
"Wo dɔm a wɔbobɔ abɔtsir tse dɛ mbɛbɛw
column3: na w’asafohemfo tse dɛ mbɛbɛw mintsimintsi a wɔsensam ban ho wɔ awɔw da mu
w’aweɔmfo atotɔ nkom: w’akofo regye hɔn ahom: wɔabɔ wo man apetse mbepɔw do
column4: na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔboaboa hɔn ano."

column2: "Wo kur no nnyi mbotowee; wo pirakur no yɛ dzen: hɔn a wɔtse wo nka nyina bɔ hɔn nsamu gu wo do; osiandɛ woana koraa do na emmfaa wo daadaa emumuyɛ no nkɔree?"
